entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:54 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
